entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023
